item.description:
Hola amigos! Here's something different, and very well reviewed. This restaurant comes highly recommended and although our reservation is on the early side I think you will be very glad you tried this place. The person I spoke with to make the reservation needed some cajoling to accept a group as large as 10 people, and had no other time slot other then 6PM. It is important that we be punctual for this one at the request of the restaurant, so let's try our best. Also, if you RSVP "yes", and your plans change, let us know ASAP. Here is my phone number if there is the need: eight-oh-two / two-three-three / nine-oh-six-oh.

Here are some reviews: http://www.yelp.com/b...

And here is a link to the restaurant: http://www.souldecuba...

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Soul de Cuba
